Isabella Rodriguez.description: continuing the Love Ville program activity at Hobbs Cafe (chatting with someone she connected with during speed dating) @ the Ville:Hobbs Cafe:cafe:behind the cafe counter

Maria Lopez.description: conversing about Maria Lopez and John Lin conversing about planning a weekend of cooking together and taking their culinary skills to the next level @ <persona> John Lin
chat: Hey John, nice to see you again! I was thinking, since we're both free this weekend, we could take our cooking skills to the next level and whip up a storm in the kitchen. What do you say? 🍳🍲

I'd love to. A culinary adventure with you sounds like the perfect way to spend a weekend. And who knows, maybe we'll create a masterpiece that'll blow everyone's minds. But more importantly, it's a great excuse to spend some quality time together.mixed_smile That being said, the real question is, are you ready for the challenge, Maria?stuck_out_tongue_winking_eye
